name: Tales of Spark: Probation
description:
⛧WISHLIST THE FULL GAME⛧
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165390/_Tales_of_Spark/

Game Features:


Young warrior, welcome to "Tales of Spark: Probation." Here, you will embark on a unique adventure.


As a martial artist, you possess dozens of skills, diverse talents, and builds. Master them skillfully, freely combine them, and defeat formidable foes.


The probation version offers multiple maps, a wealth of monsters, and powerful bosses that match your abilities and their treasures.


Random common equipment, along with dozens of exquisite special gear and items, a 4-hour storyline, and 4 optional difficulty levels.
